Meteara: We will depart for the Vector's polar region. The main sphere 
is located there. Its integrity must be preserved at all time, so we 
will install a stasis field around it. Do you have your ship?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        "And you comrade Meteara.  What is our next step?"  He 
salutes sharply 
> and stands at ease while waiting for her reply.
